backend/main.mo: Minimal backend actor containing no logic; notes that marine and beach data are handled client‑side.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of major frontend components, hooks, libraries, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark design tokens and applying shared background and border styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document setting the WeatherVerse title and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app container managing location, weather data, alerts, theming, navigation, and layout structure.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundIllust: Displays weather‑themed background images with smooth transitions and contrast‑aware gradient overlays.
frontend/src/components/BeachMarineScree: Marine and beach conditions screen with loading, error, empty states, and detailed cards for wave and temperature data.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Renders a bottom navigation bar with five tabs and dynamic styling based on the active tab.
frontend/src/components/DriverWeatherPan: Displays driver-focused weather advisories, route analysis, and loading/error states using various computed risk indicators.
frontend/src/components/FarmerGardenWeat: Shows farming and gardening weather advisories including frost, soil moisture, precipitation, planting, and spraying guidance.
frontend/src/components/FloatingAutocomp: Provides a floating dropdown positioned relative to an anchor element with dynamic sizing and outside-click dismissal.
frontend/src/components/ImminentWeatherA: Displays a dismissible banner for imminent weather alerts with icons, severity styling, and translated text.
frontend/src/components/InitialRenderErr: Implements an error boundary that catches initial render failures and shows a recovery UI with optional error details.
frontend/src/components/LaundryDryingRec: Presents recommended laundry drying time ranges based on weather data, highlighting best and additional valid periods.
frontend/src/components/LocationSearch.t: Search component providing geocoded location lookup with autocomplete and current-location display.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarAlert: Banner displaying active radar alerts with severity styling and dismiss control.
Settings UI for enabling radar alerts and adjusting alert radius within a sheet.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarEmpty: Placeholder UI shown when no location is selected for radar viewing.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarInfoP: Panel summarizing radar start time, duration, intensity, and direction for the current frame.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarLayer: UI sheet for toggling radar overlay layers and emitting updated layer sets.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarMap.t: Initializes and updates a Leaflet map with location markers and dynamic radar/overlay layers.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarOverl: Displays loading, error, or no‑data status messages for non‑precipitation radar overlays.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarPlayb: Provides timeline slider and playback buttons for navigating radar frames.
frontend/src/components/RadarScreen.tsx: Main radar view composing location search, radar map, playback, overlays, alerts, and loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/RouteLocationSea: Lightweight location search for routes with autocomplete and selectable/clearable results.
frontend/src/components/ThemeProvider.ts: Provides weather-based theme context and applies dark/light UI classes based on theme.
frontend/src/components/WeatherPanel.tsx: Displays current weather, details, advisories, and loading/error states for a selected location.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useGeocodingSearch.ts: Debounced geocoding search hook that fetches location results and tracks loading/error state.
frontend/src/hooks/useImminentWeatherAle: Evaluates imminent weather alerts, manages dismiss state, and triggers optional Android bridge notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and managing login/logout flows.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarineConditions.t: Fetches and caches marine condition data for given coordinates using react‑query.
Manages a saved location in localStorage with load, update, and clear helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file noting that query hooks are implemented elsewhere.
frontend/src/hooks/useRadarAlerts.ts: Generates and manages radar-based severe weather alerts using session-stored settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useRadarOverlayData.t: Fetches weather, air quality, and temperature grid data for radar overlay display.
frontend/src/hooks/useRadarPlayback.ts: Controls radar animation playback, frame indexing, and labeling.
frontend/src/hooks/useRainViewer.ts: Fetches and caches RainViewer radar data keyed to the user's location.
frontend/src/hooks/useRouteWeatherAnalys: Interpolates route points, fetches weather for each, and returns a route weather analysis.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionState.ts: Syncs React state with sessionStorage under a given key.
frontend/src/hooks/useWeather.ts: Fetches Open-Meteo weather data and transforms it into current, hourly, and daily formats.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides locale state and translation lookup with persistence in localStorage.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Contains translation dictionaries for Turkish and English UI strings.
frontend/src/i18n/useI18n.ts: Returns the i18n context for accessing locale and translations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive theme variables for light, dark, and weather‑based color schemes plus glass surface utility styles.
frontend/src/lib/clothingAdvisories.ts: Generates simple clothing recommendations based on temperature, precipitation, and wind using threshold rules.
frontend/src/lib/driverAdvisories.ts: Calculates road‑ice and fog warnings from temperature, humidity, cloud cover, and precipitation forecasts.
frontend/src/lib/farmerAdvisories.ts: Provides agricultural advisories including frost, soil moisture, precipitation, planting, and spraying based on hourly forecast data.
frontend/src/lib/formatDailyForecastDate: Formats ISO dates into localized short weekday and month strings for daily forecasts.
frontend/src/lib/imminentWeatherAlerts.t: Detects imminent severe weather in the next hour such as storms, snow, rain, or fog based on weather codes and humidity.
frontend/src/lib/laundryDrying.ts: Computes drying scores and recommendations for laundry using temperature, humidity, wind, and precipitation over the next 24 hours.
frontend/src/lib/openMeteo.ts: Defines weather data interfaces and functions to fetch and normalize weather and geocoding data from Open‑Meteo APIs.
frontend/src/lib/openMeteoMarine.ts: Fetches marine and supplemental weather data, computes derived visibility, and returns consolidated marine conditions.
frontend/src/lib/radarNowcastSummary.ts: Generates a short radar nowcast summary including start time, duration, estimated intensity, and direction.
frontend/src/lib/radarOverlays.ts: Computes display parameters for various radar overlay types, including storm, snow, wind, temperature, and air quality.
frontend/src/lib/rainviewer.ts: Fetches RainViewer radar map data and merges past and nowcast frames into a unified structure.
frontend/src/lib/rainviewerCache.ts: Implements session‑based caching for RainViewer data with a 5‑minute expiration.
frontend/src/lib/routeAnalysis.ts: Analyzes weather data along a route to assess risks such as freezing, fog, precipitation, and wind, producing an overall risk rating.
frontend/src/lib/tirePressure.ts: Calculates tire pressure adjustments based on temperature and vehicle type and returns recommendation metadata.
frontend/src/lib/weatherContrast.ts: Determines whether a weather theme should be displayed with a dark background.
frontend/src/lib/weatherTheme.ts: Maps weather codes to themes, icons, and translation keys for weather descriptions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and identity provider context.
frontend/src/types/androidBridge.d.ts: Declares the Android bridge interface for showing notifications on Android WebView.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config defining content paths, dark mode, container settings, extended fonts, colors, and radius tokens using CSS variables and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata for WeatherVerse including features, new requests, architecture notes, and versioned project state.
